Bash(# Create a list of files with UserLayout and process them
find src/views -name ""*.tsx"" | xargs grep -l ""UserLayout"" | while read file; do
  echo ""Processing: $file""
  # Remove import line
  sed -i '''' ''/import UserLayout from/d'' ""$file""
  # Remove empty import comment if exists
  sed -i '''' ''/^\/\/ \*\* Layout Import$/d'' ""$file""
  # Remove UserLayout wrapper - opening tag
  sed -i '''' ''s/<UserLayout>//'' ""$file""
  # Remove UserLayout wrapper - closing tag  
  sed -i '''' ''s/<\/UserLayout>//'' ""$file""
  # Remove any empty lines that might be left
  sed -i '''' ''/^[[:space:]]*$/N;/^\n$/d'' ""$file""
done)

Bash(# Fix indentation and extra whitespace in all view files
find src/views -name ""*.tsx"" | while read file; do
  # Remove multiple empty lines and fix indentation
  sed -i '''' ''/^[[:space:]]*$/N;/^\n$/d'' ""$file""
  sed -i '''' ''s/^    </<    </'' ""$file""
done)
